content.name: Kent
content.headline: Kent is the father of the main character Maya and husband of Lisa.
content.favorite_game: Retro games from the 1990s, Bare Knuckle (Streets of Rage) - Mega Drive (GENESIS)
content.description: Kent is Maya's father and Lisa's husband. He is an old geek who loves 1980s and 1990s pop culture and punk rock. He loved early HardCorePunk and was an avid fan of Straight Edge when he was younger. He is usually an average systems engineer. He works for Halliday Technologies, a subsidiary of OIO, where he primarily maintains "Dapp", which has become an obsolete technology. His mother died of an incurable illness during his childhood and his father disappeared.
